forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow likely late. Low -2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow likely late. Low 31F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow early changing to all rain and becoming intermittent late. High 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 6C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning turning to rain in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming clear later. Low -3C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Clear skies later. Low 29F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 52F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow showers with snow becoming steadier and heavier late at night. Low -1C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 7-12cm of snow expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening, becoming all snow overnight. Low 32F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 80%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected. Much stronger wind gusts expected over ridges.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow during the morning will give way to a mixture of rain and snow during the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening turning to light rain overnight. Low near 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low around 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 46F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.
